comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: This one would be a natural for someone to reconstruct:  I assume that door and walkway are still there, all you need are two people in Washington DC, willing to pose like Mrs. Davis and Dr. Lloyd...

comment.author: 12295017@N06
comment._content: F. E. Lloyd was my grandfather and my son found this photo on wikipedia. I traced it to this flicker site. Great find and terrific post! Thanks. I wonder what year it was taken?

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/12295017@N06] Thanks for getting in touch!  Always love hearing from family, and we welcome any friendly anecdotes you're willing to share in a flickr comment below.
I'll definitely forward this to some of our brilliant researchers at the Archives and see if we can't get a ballpark date. 

Sincerely, 

Susannah 
Smithsonian Institution Archives
